title: 04/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Niners, Cowboys, Washington, Watson
itunes:title: 04/08/2021 - HOUR 1 - Niners, Cowboys, Washington, Watson
description:
The Niners are rumored to be set on drafting Mac Jones

The Cowboys should draft Kyle Pitts

Washington actually has a plan to get a QB in the draft

Colin's thoughts on the disturbing Deshaun Watson story


Guest: Kyle Pitts
